title: The Lords-day, or, A succinct narration compiled out of the testimonies of H. Scripture and the reverend ancient fathers and divided into two books : in the former whereof is declared, that the observation of the Lords Day was from the Apostles ... : in the later is shewn in what things its sanctification doth consist ... / lately translated out of the Latine.
author: Young, Thomas, 1587-1655.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by E. Leach, and are to be sold by Nevil Symmons ...,
